scripts.deploy: NODE_ENV=production webpack src/demo/demo.js example/demo.js -p && npm run sass && gh-pages -d example -b gh-pages
scripts.start: webpack src/demo/demo.js example/demo.js & npm run sass && npm run watch
scripts.watch: node-sass src/demo/demo.sass example/demo.css -i -w & webpack src/demo/demo.js example/demo.js --watch & browser-sync start --server example --files 'example/*, index.html'
scripts.prepublish: NODE_ENV=production rm -rf dist && babel src/ensure-animation -d dist/ensure-animation && webpack src/ensure-animation dist/ensure-animation/index.js -p --output-library-target var --output-library EnsureAnimation
